products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless.  Perfect for injecting colour into any room.  Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  Splash Sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1575 Fabric Colour: Sloe Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Smokey Purple Electric Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Smokey Purple electric roller blind will brighten any room. The rich smokey purple of the fabric will look stunning when paired with dark wooden tones or contrasted with rich jewelled greens shades for a more opulent feel. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2069 Fabric Colour: Smokey Purple Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Orchid Purple electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The pink/purple hue is a beautiful, bold shade which draws the eye and livens up the decor. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This soft Sloe Purple electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control, and due to their chain-free design, are inherently child-safe! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This purple electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
